body_html:
I'm closing this issue for now as the original topic is resolved and we want to be able to track these issues efficiently. Please let me know if this isn't the case.

The fallout issues from this are:

  1. Conflict between TBB and OpenMP
  2. Separate regression as mentioned by @jhmenke

@mingfeima - I'll reproduce this locally and create a separate issue so we can close this out.
@juliusshufan - Are the conv numbers still an issue? I couldn't reproduce the regression as part of my benchmarks. If so, please create a separate issue.
